about.section1: Hello! My name is Adriel Santana and I am a computer engineer passionate about technology and programming. At the age of 20, I already have extensive experience as a Full-Stack mobile and web programmer, and I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow professionally.
about.section2: I have the privilege of working on incredible
about.section3: that allow me to apply my skills and knowledge to create innovative and efficient solutions.
about.section4: My goal as a programmer is to always deliver high quality results, following the best practices on the market and constantly seeking to improve my technique and creativity. I am always open to new challenges and opportunities, and I hope to be able to collaborate on projects that can add value and positively impact people's lives.
about.section5: If you are looking for a dedicated programmer, passionate about technology and with proven
about.section6: in mobile and web development, do not hesitate to

dashboardApp.name: Dashboard App
dashboardApp.description: Full-Stack Web Project. See relevant data and information about the company. Click on the gear to access. I used ChakraUi, NextJs, TypeScript and MongoDB.

mandaDex.name: MandaDex
mandaDex.description: Front End Web Project. Search and find your favorite pokemon. Api provided by Mandarin currently disabled. I used Bootstrap, NextJs and TypeScript.

tomenote.name: Tomenote
tomenote.description: Full-Stack Web Project. Create and edit notes wherever you want. I used Figma, Sass, Bootstrap, ReactJs, NodeJS and MongoDB.

gameAwards.name: Game Awards
gameAwards.description: Full-Stack Mobile Project. Vote for games and categories in the Game Awards. I used Figma, Sequelize, Express, Postgres and React Native / Expo.

oneBitLife.name: OneBitLife
oneBitLife.description: Full-Stack Mobile Project. Follow good habits to help the robot. I used React Native / Expo and SQLite.

catalogoApple.name: Apple Catalog
catalogoApple.description: Front End Web Project. Simulates a catalog with a shopping cart. I used Next Js and TypeScript.

meuClima.name: My Weather
meuClima.description: Front End Web Project. Show local, current weather and forecasts by consuming an external API. I used React.

spaceX.name: SpaceX
spaceX.description: Front End Web Project. Inspired on the SpaceX website, showing its Front-End functionality and responsiveness. I used only HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Sass.

meuPortfolio.name: My Portfolio
meuPortfolio.description: Front End Web Project. Present my portfolio with a clean, modern, responsive and high-performance look. I used Next Js, TypeScript, Sass and Bootstrap.

meuGitHub.name: My GitHub
meuGitHub.description: Here you can see my various projects and technical description about them. Take a look :)

skills.HTML: Markup language used to structure and present content on the web.
skills.CSS: Styling language used to style and format HTML elements on web pages.
skills.Sass: CSS preprocessor that adds features like variables, nesting, and mixins for easy styling.
skills.Bootstrap: Popular CSS framework that provides pre-built styles and components to create responsive interfaces.
skills.Figma: Cloud-based collaborative design tool for creating user interface prototypes and designs.
skills.JavaScript: Programming language used to create interactivity and dynamic behavior in web pages.
skills.TypeScript: Typed superset of JavaScript that adds statically typing capabilities and facilitates scalable development.
skills.Node Js: Asynchronous JavaScript runtime environment for executing server-side JavaScript code.
skills.React: Open source JavaScript library for creating reactive user interfaces and reusable components.
skills.Next Js: JavaScript framework for server-side rendering and building modern web apps.
skills.Git: Distributed version control system used to track and manage changes to source code.
skills.GitFlow: Git branching methodology that promotes a structured and collaborative workflow.
skills.MongoDB: Document-based NoSQL database used to store data in a flexible and scalable way.
skills.PostgreSQL: Open source relational database management system known for its reliability and advanced features.
skills.Docker: Container virtualization platform that allows you to package and distribute applications with their dependencies.
skills.TDD: Development methodology focused on automated testing.
skills.DDD: Approach to software development focused on modeling the problem domain into solutions.
skills.Design Patterns: Recurring and proven solutions to software design problems, aiming for reusability and modularity.
